Body:
Description: Hello Team,

I want to upgrade all the windows and Linux (Ubuntu) machines at once. Can I do this as a batch job ?

And also can you give me the Linux client setup for Ubuntu 12,20,21,22,23 & 24 ?

Thanks
What We've Learned Updated: Client is asking for different Ubuntu packages and if it's possible to deploy them in bulk at once as well as for Windows.

Next Steps Updated: Sent them note with the needed details.
Waiting for their reply.
